AboutMe.title: About me
texts: I began my programming journey at the age of 14 and since then, I have been refining both my technical and creative skills. I have experience in front-end development and UX/UI Design, which allows me to collaborate effectively with development teams by bringing an additional design perspective. Furthermore, I am always seeking to expand my knowledge in areas such as back-end and other emerging technologies.

As an autistic person with level 1 support needs, my meticulous approach to projects reflects my commitment to creating solutions that positively impact people's lives. Every solution I develop aims to improve user experience and make technology more accessible and enjoyable.

texts: I work on the development of products focused on communication automation, covering channels such as WhatsApp, RCS, email and SMS, using React and Next.js. I contribute to the creation of complex and reusable interfaces and components aligned with the needs of various teams.

I am responsible for maintaining and evolving the “Docs” product, with a focus on security, performance and scalability. Additionally, I developed a BFF with authentication, centralizing integrations and strengthening the security of the solutions.

I collaborate directly with PO, PM, Product Design, Back-End and SRE in planning, estimation and alignment of deliverables. I also support the Front-End team management, helping divide tasks and providing technical guidance during development.

I contributed significantly to the migration of pages from the legacy Vignette technology to Next.JS. In addition, I developed an intuitive page that helps customers obtain the second copy of their internet bill. This project involved various challenges related to different components and backend integrations.

In my daily work, I used: Next.JS, React.js, TypeScript, JSON for data development and integration, Azure for code versioning, SASS, HTML, JavaScript, and Figma to work with UX-designed interfaces. I also have experience with GitLab, AWS, and Node.js.
Completed higher education degree at Cruzeiro do Sul University, finished in 06/2025
At TopWay, I acquired the full foundation of the language, which today allows me to read texts confidently, communicate with great fluency, and understand native speakers in their mother tongue.
The course’s focus on practical projects allows me to quickly apply what I learn in real situations, preparing me for market challenges.
